column2: Town communal grounds provide cultural income and increased stability through the presence of a chieftain's or warlord's building.
These community buildings provide migrating barbarians with commercial income or can also grant additional food and population growth.
The town waterworks chain increases province-wide sanitation, public order, and growth, by providing better water distribution and storage in all regions.
The town waterworks chain increases growth and province-wide sanitation by providing better water distribution and storage in all regions.
The town waterworks chain enables the construction of bath-houses, increasing province-wide sanitation and growth.
The town chain bolsters a settlement's defences as well as being vital for provincial growth and stability.
The town centre chain can provide increased public order or bolster your income from commerce and trade.
The settlement chain provides the nomads with the nucleus of the camp, providing subsistence wealth and ensuring the growth of the horde.
The nomadic military recruitment chain enables the training of the majority of a horde's units.
The military upgrade chain provides better equipment for your troops, as well as enabling the recruitment and construction of siege weapons.
The migrating settlement chain increases the horde's growth and provides basic recruits.
The migrating recruitment buildings enable the recruitment of more diverse units and increases a migrating horde's recruitment capacity.
The migrating leadership buildings are essential to the horde's solidarity, increasing force integrity and providing income from culture.
The migrating leadership buildings are essential to the horde's solidarity, increasing force integrity and providing income from culture.
The migrating artisan chain provides income from industrial buildings in addition to other financial boosts.
The food storage chain increases sanitation levels by keeping food supplies fresher for longer, minimising the chances of disease outbreak in the province capital.
The city waterworks chain provides access to aqueducts and sewers which can increase population growth by improving sanitation levels across the province.
The city waterworks chain can increase food supplies, population growth, or province-wide sanitation by providing better water distribution and storage in all regions.
The city chain bolsters the capital's wall defences as well as being vital for provincial growth and stability.
The city centre chain enables the building of markets, palaces, entertainment venues, or even libraries, each providing its own advantages in addition to income from culture or commerce.
The city centre chain enables the building of markets, entertainment venues, or even libraries, each providing its own advantages in addition to income from culture or commerce.
The Azedan recruitment chain is only available in province capitals, increasing recruitment capacity while providing training for elite cavalry units and elephants.
The agricultural chain increases food supplies and agricultural income from crops and animal husbandry buildings.
The administration building chain can improve public order or improve your treasury by increasing commercial income and trade agreement tariffs.

Raiding buildings can only be constructed in region capitals, increasing public order and providing more garrison troops to help repel any attacks.
Port chains can be developed as either fishing, trade or military branches, increasing either food supplies, trade income or naval vessels respectively.
Nomadic artisan buildings provide income from industry and can also be used to boost growth or provide better equipment for recruits.
Military recruitment buildings can be constructed in any city or town, providing access to most types of infantry, skirmisher, and cavalry units.
Levy recruitment buildings are only available in region capitals, providing access to cheap levied troops.
Infantry recruitment buildings are only available in province capitals, enabling the training of archers and elite foot soldiers.
